mapper.insert: insert into QNA (product_no, qna_writer, qna_content, qna_write_date, qna_answer_content, qna_answer_write_date) values (#{productNo}, #{qnaWriter}, #{qnaContent}, #{qnaWriteDate}, #{qnaAnswerContent}, #{qnaAnswerWriteDate})
mapper.select: select count(*) from QNA where product_no = #{productNo}
